pizzerias.name: Mąka i Woda
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Hawaii (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella fior di latte, szynka, ananas, bazylia)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria with a certified wood-fired oven from Naples. Despite their traditional focus, they offer a Hawaiian pizza made with high-quality ingredients and imported Italian mozzarella.

pizzerias.name: Pizzaiola
pizzerias.specialty: Hawajska Premium (sos pomidorowy, mozzarella, włoska szynka gotowana, świeży ananas, oregano)
pizzerias.description: Upscale pizzeria serving Roman-style pizzas with crispy, airy crusts. Their Hawaiian pizza uses fresh rather than canned pineapple and imported Italian cooked ham.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Mamma Mia
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicana (sos pomidorowy, ser mozzarella, szynka, ananas, kukurydza)
pizzerias.description: Family-friendly pizzeria serving classic Polish-style pizzas. Their Hawaiian variation includes corn as an additional topping, a popular addition in Eastern European pizzas.
